title: Raku - English style
creator_credit: Castle Hill Brenchley, John Anderson and Robert Fournier
brief_description: A group of English potters demonstrate how Raku pottery is made, glazed and fired. The commentator clearly explains how the kiln is made while the potters construct one and use it.
